2b5d45c8-0425-4064-ac6f-3543acacc143.description: The earner has demonstrated basic knowledge of critical thinking skills. 9f89c56b-8654-4301-90c6-1285c77343e8.description: Bu rozete sahip olan kişi, gelişim odaklı bir zihniyeti anlama konusunda temel bilgi ve yetkinlikleri sergilemiştir. Bu rozetin sahibi, zihinlerin sabit veya gelişim odaklı olduğunu tanımlayabilir, öğrenme sürecindeki hataların rolünü göz önünde bulundurabilir ve mevcut durumlara/zorluklara karşı gelişim odaklı zihniyeti uygulayabilir.

e850b444-6b9f-4dba-aa19-d84617fa2781.description: Bu rozete sahip olan kişi, eleştirel düşünme konusunda temel bilgi ve yetkinlikleri sergilemiştir. 11518eb4-85c9-44a3-a287-84dfe8305075.description: Earners of this badge are capable of using Pearson MyLab gradebook in detail. They can change score weights, customise scoring options, manage students results by omitting and deleting results, setting late penalty, and changing scores. Earners are able to add adaptive follow ups into their course and use Learning Catalytics to promote peer instruction and active learning.
11518eb4-85c9-44a3-a287-84dfe8305075.name: Level 2 Digital Academic excellence: Pearson MyLab

issuer.summary: issued by Pearson Turkey Higher Education Programs

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete a full semester managing Gradebook data for all your assigned Pearson courses and assignments, changing weights of different types of activities and including at least 3 adaptive follow ups with Learning Catalytics into the course.
